definitions.definition: A table or list of syllabic letters or syllables .
A writing system where each character represents a complete syllable .
examples: It shouldn't be hard to come up with a musical syllabary in which pitches code for vowels and timbres code for consonants.

main_definition: ( orthography ) A table or list of syllabic letters or syllables .
secondary_definitions: ( orthography ) A writing system where each character represents a complete syllable .
